title: Why doesn't my phone ring or vibrate for an incoming call after I have paired it with my watch?
answer: Check the **Notification** settings in the drop-down menu on your watch. If **Notification** is set to **None**, your watch will set your phone to Do not disturb mode. Change the setting to **All** to disable the Do not disturb mode on your phone.
faqType: SIM Card, SMS, Calls, and Contacts
keywords: phone, vibrate, ring, incoming, call, pair
